name: symbolization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of using symbols to represent something, or an example of this: This is a good symbolization of the position of women. The study aimed to demonstrate the importance of symbolization in the way that ideas about health are constructed.
More examplesFewer examplesThe task involved no obvious internal symbolization or higher level reasoning.More explicit symbolizations will be introduced.There's a key on the map so you can use this symbolization to help you.
